author: Martha Cruz
title: Community rallies to support Las Vegas theater after $10k equipment theft
text: {p}{ } Proof of concept AI assistant.{/p}{p}The Grinch visited one local business early Christmas morning, taking with him thousands of dollars worth of equipment.{/p}{p}According to a GoFundMe page, $10,000 worth of computer, sound, and musical equipment was taken from the Majestic Repertory Theatre in downtown Las Vegas.{/p}{p}This comes just as the theater gears up for its next production in January.{/p}{p}\"Without theft insurance - which is now being sought - the initial thought would be to work off the loss over the long run. However, one can't produce a musical without musical (and sound) equipment - so that plan is out the window.\" the GoFundMe stated.{/p}{p}{strong}MORE ON NEWS 3 | {a href=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/climbers-rescued-after-storm-strands-them-overnight-in-pine-creek\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/news/local/climbers-rescued-after-storm-strands-them-overnight-in-pine-creek\"}Rescue team saves stranded climbers on Pine Creek route after Christmas Eve storm{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}In less than a day, the business was able to exceed its $10,000 goal, which has raised over $12,000 as of Thursday afternoon.{/p}{p}Today will be slightly cooler as a storm system races across northern Nevada spreading a few clouds as far south as southern Nevada.{/p}{p}This will keep high temps in the low 60s to upper 50s today.{/p}{p}High pressure will move in off the Pacific again just in time for the weekend.{/p}{p}Highs on Saturday approach the mid-60s with even warmer temperatures on tap for Sunday.{/p}{p}Temperatures on Sunday will be near the 70-degree mark.{ }{/p}{p}It has been 165 days since we saw any measurable rain here in the valley.{ }{/p}{p}Severe to extreme drought conditions remain across southern Nevada.{ }{/p}{p}Most of Clark County is experiencing Extreme drought conditions.{/p}{p}{a href=\"https://news3lv.com/station/people/fidel-moreno-meza-08-13-2024\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://news3lv.com/station/people/fidel-moreno-meza-08-13-2024\"}Fidel Moreno-Meza{ }{/a}{/p}{p}{ } Proof of concept AI assistant.{/p}{p}The Grinch visited one local business early Christmas morning, taking with him thousands of dollars worth of equipment.{/p}{p}According to a GoFundMe page, $10,000 worth of computer, sound, and musical equipment was taken from the Majestic Repertory Theatre in downtown Las Vegas.{/p}{p}This comes just as the theater gears up for its next production in January.{/p}{p}\"Without theft insurance -
